title: Crab, tomato & avocado cakes with sweet chilli sauce

ingredients.item: 2 x 100g packs Seafood & Eat It Fifty Fifty Crab
Small piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
½ small red onion, finely chopped
½ ripe avocado, stoned, peeled and diced
1 medium essential Waitrose British Free Range Egg, yolk
2 large essential Waitrose British Free Range Eggs, beaten
Thai sweet chilli sauce, to serve

instructions.step: Mix the crab with the ginger, chilli, coriander, red onion, avocado, tomato, lemon juice and seasoning. Stir in 50g of the breadcrumbs and bind the mixture with the egg yolk. Using floured hands, shape into 16 equal cakes.
Dip the cakes into seasoned flour then into beaten egg and finally into breadcrumbs to coat completely. Chill until needed.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and cook the crab cakes on both sides until golden and crisp. Serve with the chilli sauce for dipping.
